@Configuration @Requires(property="crac.enabled", defaultValue="true", value="true")

Package io.micronaut.crac.support

Adds Ordered CRaC support to the Micronaut Framework.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CracContext
    The gateway between Micronaut and the CRaC api.
    CracContextProvider
    API to get the Context for checkpoint/restore notifications.
    CracResourceRegistrar
    Registers all defined Resources for Coordinated Restore at Checkpoint.
    OrderedCracResource
    A Coordinated Restore at Checkpoint Resource that may also be Ordered.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CracFacadeResource
    The bridge between a Micronaut CRaC Resource and the CRaC api.
    DefaultCracContext
    The gateway between Micronaut and the CRaC api.
    GlobalCracContextProvider
    Gets a Global Context through Core.getGlobalContext().
    OrderedCracResourceRegistrar
    Registers all defined Resources for Coordinated Restore at Checkpoint.
    StartupCracRegistration
    Registers all defined Resources for Coordinated Restore at Checkpoint at application startup.

Package io.micronaut.crac.support Description

Adds Ordered CRaC support to the Micronaut Framework.
Since:
3.7.0
Author:
Tim Yates
